Instruction: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat (around 350-400Â°F).
In a small bowl, mix together honey, lime juice, and cinnamon to create a glaze.
Thread the pineapple chunks onto skewers.
Brush the pineapple skewers with the glaze, coating them evenly.
Place the skewers on the preheated grill and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until grill marks appear and the pineapple caramelizes.
Remove the skewers from the grill and serve them immediately as a sweet and tangy side dish.
